data.eml:eml: Resurrection of Scolopendra longipes Wood and Scolopendra cubensis Saussure from synonymy with Scolopendra alternans Leach (Chilopoda, Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae): an enigmatic species-group needing phylogeographic analysis, with an overview on the origin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mercurio, Randy J. (2016): Resurrection of Scolopendra longipes Wood and Scolopendra cubensis Saussure from synonymy with Scolopendra alternans Leach (Chilopoda, Scolopendromorpha, Scolopendridae): an enigmatic species-group needing phylogeographic analysis, with an overview on the origin. Zootaxa 4111 (1): 1-20, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.1.1
